description:
Using the latest SAP installation methodology, we create a fully deployable vmware based image for the SAP ECC IDES application. In it we install some of the latest front end tools such as SAP Fiori, SAP Personas and SAP NWBC.

You can see the entire procedure hands on. There is no Power point presentation as such as all the videos are 95% hands on and explained properly. You will also learn advanced basis and some tips and tricks only expert basis knows.

This is a super indepth course and you can skip chapters that you already know and watch and learn some new topics. All VIDEOS ARE 1080p SUPER HIGH QUALITY resolution.
title: Hands-On BASIS Training -  ECC IDES, Fiori, Personas, NWBC
